whatGet: what do you want me to get?
provideNameAndUrl: you have to provide me with a name for the item and an url :)
provideUrl: you have to provide me with an url for the item :)
existingItem: there's already a resource with this name...
provideName: you have to provide me with a name of the item :/
noPermissionsDelete: you do not have permissions to delete this resource:/
helpGet:
If you provide me a name of the asset,
 I'll provide it to you. for eg.
`georg get niji`
helpHelp: What do you think it does, dummy...
helpCreate:
If you provide me with a name for the new item
 and an url, I'll create a new item for you. For eg.
`georg create niji https://www.google.com`
helpDelete:
If you provide me with a name of the asset,
 I can delete it for you if you are the author. For eg.
`georg delete niji`
helpEdit:
If you provide me with a name of the asset,
 I can edit it for you if you are the author. for eg.
`georg edit niji https://www.bing.com`
helpRandom: I'll bring you the most random thing I can find!
helpDefault: I did not recognize this command :/ type `georg help` for more info.
help:
Here's the list of commands!
`georg get NAME_OF_ITEM`
`georg create NAME_OF_ITEM LINK`
`georg delete NAME_OF_ITEM`
`georg edit NAME_OF_ITEM LINK`
`georg random`
For more information, type `georg help COMMAND`
editNoPermissions: you don't have permissions to edit this item...
commands: Here is the list of all items:
random: the most random thing I found!
